name: Bulbasaur
fact: Bulbasaur's plant grows steadily larger as it gains experience.

name: Ivysaur
fact: Ivysaur is a transition Pokémon that evolves from Bulbasaur and prepares for its next evolution.

name: Venusaur
fact: Venusaur's flower is said to bloom when it gets plenty of sunlight.

name: Chikorita
fact: Chikorita uses the leaf on its head to sense the warmth of the sun.

name: Bayleef
fact: Bayleef’s aroma has a calming effect and can soothe its Trainer's stress.

name: Meganium
fact: Meganium's aroma spreads over a wide area and makes the environment more peaceful.

name: Treecko
fact: Treecko's grip is so strong it can climb trees and cling to walls effortlessly.

name: Grovyle
fact: Grovyle's speed and agility make it an expert at navigating through dense forests.

name: Sceptile
fact: Sceptile can blend into the trees and strike with incredible speed.
